name: Forest Escape
description:
Forest Escape is:
Run, run away. You have to escape from this dangerous, terrible forest. Danger breathes in your back and it's gaining speed, it will soon catch you up, run faster. Just don't hit the tree!How to play: Use WASD or Arrows
Watch out for the trees
Beat the high scoreForest Escape is:
  • Beautiful graphics
  • Great ambience
  • Gool sounds
  • Increscent action
